thought:
The query contains keywords like "high severity" and "summary" which can be used to filter the work-items and generate a summary. Also, the query mentions "slack" and "customer Cust123" which can be used to filter the work-items based on source channel and rev_org respectively. Hence, I will use the tool "works_list" to filter the work-items and then use "summarize_objects" to generate a summary of the filtered work-items.

Action: works_list

Action Input: 'ticket.severity': 'high', 'ticket.source_channel': 'slack', 'ticket.rev_org': 'Cust123'
The tool "works_list" has returned a list of work-items that match the given filters. Now, I will use the tool "summarize_objects" to generate a summary of these work-items.

Action: summarize_objects

Action Input: $$PREV[0]
Final Answer: The summary of high severity tickets coming in from slack from customer Cust123 is $$PREV[1].
